category: news
title: "Salesforce Grants Equity Awards to Troops.ai Employees Under Its Inducement Equity Incentive Plan"
excerpt: "Through the Plan, Salesforce granted a total of 33,788 restricted stock units (\"RSUs\") to 13 Troops.ai employees. The RSUs vest over four years with 25 percent of the RSUs vesting on the first anniversary of the grant date and the balance vesting quarterly thereafter in 12 equal installments,"
